MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.15pm to safely carry out repairs to an underground cable fault caused by third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:55pm on the 16th of December 2020
